MVCollegeStep6JSON: {"pageElements":[{"elements":[{"id":"intro","header":"Link your Account","description":"Now that you've set your goal, let's put that plan into action. \n\nYou can easily track your savings progress by linking a college savings account to myVoyage.","marginBottom":"22px"},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/unexpectedExpenses/link_account.svg"},{"answerId":"linkExistingAccount","bold":true,"id":"input","radioLabel":"Select an account you would like to use as your college savings account","type":"accountRadioButton"},{"header":"+ Add New Account","id":"contentModal","marginBottom":"28px","elements":[{"header":"Add Account","id":"manageMXaccount"}]},{"id":"intro","description":"If you don't have an account designated for college savings, you may want to consider opening one to help keep your savings on track.","marginBottom":"22px"},{"id":"button","label":"Continue","link":"default","noBackLink":"false","noSpacing":"true"},{"id":"button","label":"Not Now","link":"default","type":"secondary","noSpacing":"true"},{"id":"image","imageUrl":"assets/icon/journeys/hsa/secure-connection-lock.svg","description":"Secure Connection","maxWidth":"150px","marginTop":"20px"}]}]}
